sections.title: Details
content: It is a Painting competition.
Submission: 14th-19th December.

sections.title: Structure
content: Participants will submit their paintings through the Drive link which will be provided on Whatsapp of the participant after the registration.
Top entries shortlisted by the judge will be put on a story by the official account of Impressions COEP.

sections.title: Rules and Guidelines
content: Allowed for only college students.
Only use of mentioned medium of painting is permissible- Watercolor, Poster colors, Acrylic Colors, Oil Paints, Gouache Colors.
Participants must paint on an A3 sheet paper.
Vulgarity and obscenity at any point are strictly not allowed.
Image Submission Rules:
Participants have to submit a jpeg/ jpg/ png file with their signature on the drawing and date.
File must be named 'Coloursplash_ParticipantName'.
The folder should be uploaded to your personal Google Drive. Access permission must be given to 'Anyone with link can view/edit'
The link to your Personal Google Drive should be uploaded to the form shared to you on Whatsapp. The Access permission should be given as stated above.
The file uploaded must be clearly visible for the judgement of the artwork.
Image editing is strictly prohibited.

sections.title: Details
content: It is an online sketching competition.

sections.title: Structure
content: Participants will have to draw on an A3 sheet.
The following mediums of sketching are allowed: Pencil, Graphite, Charcoal, and Color Pencils.
Top entries shortlisted by the judge will be put on the story of Impressions COEP official page

sections.title: Rules and Guidelines
content: The competition is open to all college students. If the participant is not a college student, he/she/they will not be eligible for the judgment of their artwork.
The artwork must be submitted in the given time only. No requests for extra time will be entertained.
Vulgarity and obscenity at any point are strictly not allowed.
Image Submission Rules:
Participants have to submit a jpeg/ jpg/ png file with at least three stages of their work. All files should be in a single folder.'
The folder should be uploaded to your personal Google Drive. Access permission must be given to 'Anyone with a link can view/edit'
The link to your Personal Google Drive should be uploaded to the form shared to you on WhatsApp. Access permission should be given as stated above.
The file uploaded must be clearly visible for the judgment of the artwork.
Image editing is strictly prohibited.

sections.title: Details
content: It is a Mandala Drawing competition.
Submission: 14th-19th December.

sections.title: Structure
content: Participants will submit their Mandala Art through the Drive link which will be provided on Whatsapp of the participant after the registration.
Top entries shortlisted by the judge will be put on a story by the official account of Impressions COEP.

sections.title: Rules and Guidelines
content: Allowed for only college students.
Black and White as well as Colored Mandalas are allowed.
Participants must draw their Mandalas on an A4 sheet paper.
Mandalas can be drawn in any of the following medium: Pastels, Pens, Pencils, Paints and Markers.
Vulgarity and obscenity at any point are strictly not allowed.
Image Submission Rules:
Participants have to submit a jpeg/ jpg/ png file with their signature on the drawing and date.
File must be named 'Cirkala_ParticipantName'.
The folder should be uploaded to your personal Google Drive. Access permission must be given to 'Anyone with link can view/edit'
The link to your Personal Google Drive should be uploaded to the form shared to you on Whatsapp. The Access permission should be given as stated above.
The file uploaded must be clearly visible for the judgement of the artwork.
Image editing is strictly prohibited.
